title: Hero launches powerful Mavrick 440: Here are price, engine, features, sale dates, other details
description: Hero MotoCorp is entering the mid-capacity segment of the Indian market with the launch of its most powerful motorcycle, the Mavrick 440. The motorcycle shares its foundation with the Harley-Davidson X440 and features unique design elements. It is equipped with a 440cc single-cylinder, oil-cooled engine and comes with a fully digital instrument cluster and Bluetooth connectivity. The launch is scheduled for January 23, 2023, as Hero MotoCorp aims to expand its product lineup.
